alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 2:09PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and southwestern Calcasieu Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 208 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Toomey, or near Vinton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vinton, Toomey, Carlyss and Hackberry. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
